title: The Internet's Broken, Not Just Reddit – Techlore Talks 11
description:
Front-ends and third-party services still dependent on big tech companies are falling like flies - Reddit, Twitter, Invidious, Aurora - here's why and what we need to do about it! We also discuss Debian 12, Proton's (insane!) marketing, and Techlore Clips.

Our Patreon: https://patreon.com/techlore
Our Forum: https://discuss.techlore.tech
Techlore Talks Podcast & RSS: https://dispatch.techlore.tech/

Timestamps:
0:00:00 Setting the Scene
0:00:58 How Reddit threatened every client & bot
0:12:28 How YouTube threatened Invidious
0:20:50 How Google threatened Aurora
0:28:58 What needs to happen to make this stop
0:36:58 How Techlore is already (mostly) independent 
0:39:46 Debian 12 Release Overhyped?
0:47:06 Techlore Clips - Our New Channel
0:49:22 Proton's Marketing Has Gone Too Far
1:04:20 Final Words
